Reader:    Gemalto Ezio Shield (I18C0144251864) 00 00
IdVendor:  0x08E6
IdProduct: 0x34C2
[2, 17, 0, 2, 127, 0, 0, 0, 6, 0, 0, 0, 1, 4, 16, 1, 255, 255, 0, 0, 0]
LogicalLCDLineNumber (Logical number of LCD lines): 2
LogicalLCDRowNumber (Logical number of characters per LCD line): 17
LcdInfo: 0
  b0 indicates if scrolling available: False
EntryValidationCondition: 2
PC/SCv2 features:
 VerifyPinStart: True
 VerifyPinFinish: True
 ModifyPinStart: True
 ModifyPinFinish: True
 GetKeyPressed: True
 VerifyPinDirect: True
 ModifyPinDirect: True
 Abort: False
 GetKey: False
 WriteDisplay: False
 SetSpeMessage: False
 bTimeOut2: False
 bListSupportedLanguages: True
  [9, 4, 12, 4, 37, 4, 25, 4, 21, 4, 22, 4, 5, 4, 27, 4]
  0x0409: English (United States)
  0x040C: French (Standard)
  0x0425: Estonian
  0x0419: Russian
  0x0415: Polish
  0x0416: Portuguese (Brazil)
  0x0405: Czech
  0x041B: Slovak
 bNumberMessageFix: True
 bPPDUSupportOverXferBlock: False
 bPPDUSupportOverEscape: False
VersionNumber: 1
MinimumPINSize: 4
MaximumPINSize: 16
Firewall: True
FirewalledCommand_SW1: 0xFF
FirewalledCommand_SW2: 0xFF
